Parameters:
rate imports the monthly interest rate as a percentage
numFree imports the number of free withdrawals allowed
howMany imports the number of withdrawals made
fee imports the fee to be charged for a withdrawal

void ChequingSavingsAccount::updateMonthEnd (  )  [virtual]

Postcondition:
Interest earned has been added to the balance

The number of withdrawals is reset to 0
